__TOC__

Still trying to migrate away from Windows, but there are several apps that I can't find replacements for in Linux land.  Hopefully more software shops will wake up and release cross platform.

=== New Install Checklist ===
* keyboard and mouse speed, etc.
* select Compiz Fusion
* Firefox - extensions, etc.
* Thunderbird - extensions, etc.
* select additional Synaptic repositories
* Backup - http://www.mondorescue.org/ + http://www.conduit-project.org/
* install Truecrypt - http://www.truecrypt.org/downloads.php
* swappiness - 'gksudo gedit /etc/sysctl.conf' -> add 'vm.swappiness=10' - https://help.ubuntu.com/community/SwapFaq
* colour profiler - http://lprof.sourceforge.net/
* Preload - http://www.techthrob.com/tech/preload.php - '''NOTE''' - briefly tested and seemed to cause some minor hanging in 8.04A6
* Auto FSCK Disk check util - https://wiki.ubuntu.com/AutoFsck
* add Skype repository: "deb http://download.skype.com/linux/repos/debian/ stable non-free"
* Internet Explorer - http://www.tatanka.com.br/ies4linux/page/Main_Page
* LAMP - http://www.howtoforge.com/ubuntu_lamp_for_newbies
* Nautilus scripts - http://ubuntu-unleashed.blogspot.com/2007/09/125-nautilus-scripts-to-simplify.html
* Secure Ubuntu - http://www.zolved.com/synapse/view_content/27995/Top_Ten_basic_things_to_know_about_securing_Ubuntu
